text: Fadrique de Guzmán (died 1492) was a Roman Catholic prelate who served as Bishop of Mondoñedo (1462–1492)."Bishop Fadrique de Guzmán" Catholic- Hierarchy.org. David M. Cheney. Retrieved September 5, 2016"Diocese of Mondoñedo-Ferrol" Catholic-Hierarchy.org. David M. Cheney. Retrieved February 29, 2016"Diocese of Mondoñedo–Ferrol" GCatholic.org. Gabriel Chow. Retrieved February 29, 2016 ==Biography== In 1462, Fadrique de Guzmán was appointed during the papacy of Pope Pius II as Bishop of Mondoñedo. He served as Bishop of Mondoñedo until his death in 1492. == References == Category:15th-century Roman Catholic bishops Category:Bishops appointed by Pope Pius II Category:1492 deaths
title: Fadrique de Guzmán
